trans-unit.source: Represents an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: For more information about signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] packages, see Chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre definições de assinatura no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] pacotes, consulte o capítulo 10 em XML Paper especificação (XPS) disponível para transferência em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>assinaturas digitais, consulte o artigo da MSDN Framework Assinatura Digital da Open Packaging Conventions disponíveis em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: For information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Consulte XML Paper especificação (XPS) disponível para transferência em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>da assinatura.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The Culture property is optional.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de idioma é opcional.

trans-unit.source: The cultural information of the signature.
trans-unit.target: As informações cultural da assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unwritten property changes exist for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> class and must be written to the package's stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se existirem alterações de propriedade unwritten para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref> classe e deve ser escrita para o fluxo do pacote.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if uncommitted changes exist; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se existirem alterações não confirmadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string value of the signature intention agreement that the signer is signing against.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da cadeia do contrato de intenção de assinatura do signatário é assinatura contra.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `Intent` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `Intent` elemento de definições de assinatura no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacotes, consulte o capítulo 10 no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] especificação, que pode obter no [XPS: especificação e transfere licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the intention agreement; for example, "I have read and agree."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>Que representa o contrato de intenção; por exemplo, "li e Concordo."</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity of the person who is requested to sign (or has signed) the package.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a identidade da pessoa que o pacote for pedida para iniciar sessão (ou em assinou).

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `SignerName` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade corresponde ao `SignerName` atributo do `SignatureDefinition` elemento um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacote.

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference in the names.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção a diferença nos nomes.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SignerName` attribute, see chapter 10 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `SignerName` de atributos, consulte o capítulo 10 do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] especificação, que pode obter no [XPS: especificação e transfere licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the signer, for example, "Mary Jones, Marketing Dept."
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o signatário, por exemplo, "Maria Jones, dodep. de Marketing"</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time by which the requested signer must sign the parts of the specified document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data e hora através do qual o signatário pedido tem de iniciar sessão as partes do documento especificado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SignBy` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `SignBy` elemento de definições de assinatura no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacotes, consulte o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] especificação, que pode obter no [XPS: especificação e transfere licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the deadline by which the signer must sign the package.
trans-unit.target: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.DateTime>que representa o prazo através do qual o signatário têm de assinar o pacote.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Nullable>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the legal jurisdiction where the package is signed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o jurisdiction legal onde o pacote está assinado.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `SigningLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade corresponde do `SigningLocation` elemento de definições de assinatura no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacotes.

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference in the names.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção a diferença nos nomes.

trans-unit.source: The original producer of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package can set this property.
trans-unit.target: O produtor original do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacote pode definir esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the signer can set the property at the time of signing the package if no one else has already signed.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, o signatário pode definir a propriedade no momento da assinatura do pacote, se ninguém mais já tem sessão iniciada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SigningLocation` element, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `SigningLocation` elemento, consulte capítulo 10 no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] especificação, que pode obter no [XPS: especificação e transfere licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the jurisdiction, for example, "State of Utah, United States."
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que representa o jurisdiction, por exemplo, "Estado de Utah, Estados Unidos."</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um identificador exclusivo para este <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To link a `Signature` element to this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>, you must set the `Id` attribute of the `Signature` to the value of the SpotId property.
trans-unit.target: Para ligar um `Signature` elemento para que este <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>, tem de definir o `Id` atributo o `Signature` para o valor da propriedade SpotId.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Signature` elements, see the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre `Signature` elementos, consulte o [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) esquema.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SpotID` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `SpotID` atributo do `SignatureDefinition` elemento num [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] do pacote, consulte o capítulo 10 no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] especificação, que pode obter no [XPS: especificação e transfere a licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.Guid> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the signature definition.
trans-unit.target: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.Guid>que representa o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] da definição de assinatura.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Nullable>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location that specifies where to display the visible digital signature in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a localização que especifica onde apresentar a assinatura digital visível num [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SpotLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `SpotLocation` elemento de definições de assinatura no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacotes, consulte o capítulo 10 no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] especificação, que pode obter no [XPS: especificação e transfere licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.SpotLocation"></xref> that represents the location in the package where a visible request for a signature appears.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.SpotLocation"> </xref> que representa a localização do pacote de onde aparece um pedido de visível para uma assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
